= Introduction =

PBAnki or Mindcraft is a spaced repetition software.

Spaced repetition is a learning technique that incorporates increasing intervals of time between subsequent review of previously learned material; this exploits the psychological spacing effect. You can read more detailed article on wikipedia [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Spaced_repetition]


What software is awailable



[Documentation_for_developers Documentation for developers]

= Why this software =


PBAnki is designed to be light-weighted and efficient as possible to run on compact devices such as e-ink based book readers or smartphones.

PBAnki is made compatible with deck files of Anki - popular spaced repetition software with rich functionality.
